title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 58 - Minimum Standards For Form, Content And Sale Of Medicare Supplement And Medicare Select Insurance, Including Standards Of Full And Fair Disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 58 - Minimum Standards For Form, Content And Sale Of Medicare Supplement And Medicare Select Insurance, Including Standards Of Full And Fair Disclosure

State Regulations
§ 58.1 - Rules relating to content of forms for medicare supplement insurance
§ 58.2 - Rules relating to the standard medicare supplement benefit plans and the make-up of medicare supplement benefit plans issued for an effective date of coverage prior to june 1, 2010
§ 58.3 - Required disclosure statement for policies and certificates meeting definition of section 52.11 or 52.14 of this title issued with an effective date for coverage prior to june 1, 2010
§ 58.4 - Rules relating to content of forms for medicare supplement insurance policies and certificates issued with an effective date for coverage on or after june 1, 2010
§ 58.5 - Required disclosure statement for policies and certificates meeting definition of sections 52.11 and 52.14 of this title issued with an effective date for coverage on or after june 1, 2010
§ 58.6 - Medicare select policies and certificates

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 58

Statutory authority: Federal Social Security Act, 42 U.S.C., §
1395
ss; Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 3201, 3216, 3217, 3218, 3221, 3231, 3232, 4235; art. 43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
